p.i: I am the wound, and yet the blade!
The slap, and yet the cheek that takes it!
The limb, and yet the wheel that breaks it,
The torturer, and he who's flayed!

Sorcerers use their baleful power; When
Graves give up their buried dead To profit by the sanctioned hour
